subject: Suits and Litigation
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury testified at Anucha Browne Sanders’s sexual harassment trial against Isiah Thomas that he had sex with an intern then working for Browne Sanders after a group outing to a strip club.
snippet: Stephon Marbury testified at Anucha Browne Sanders’s sexual harassment trial against Isiah Thomas that he had sex with an intern then working for Browne Sanders after a group outing to a strip club.
